attributes.title: Doesn’t accept me
attributes.review: Constant bombardment of messages which are leading me to delete the app because it supposedly thinks I am “too much of a minority to support Donald Trump.” This is racial profiling and doesn’t make sense because I am white. Will not be showing my support again.

attributes.title: I couldn’t open the app
attributes.review: Everytime I clicked on the app it would open the immediately close again, I tried to delete the app then redown load and reset my phone. Nothing worked, this app is trash

attributes.title: MY PHONE BROKE BECAUSE OF THIS
attributes.review: So I downloaded the app because I wanted to put Trump2020 on a grave 🤩🧚‍♀️💫 But when i first opened the app! I saw a carrot😪 i was confused so i asked my mom Who in the hell put the muffins in the freeza!? She said she did😡😡n e wayz she said this “carrot“ should not be listened to SO SHUT UP CARROT instead lets vote for Barron Trump🤩🤩🤠🥰✨🌟💫

attributes.title: MY PHONE EXPLODED
attributes.review: i downloaded the app and as soon as i opened it IT EXPLODED MY PHONE the little kid next to me now has a brain tumor this isn’t fair to 2020 do you think that kid wanted a brain tumor? is it because the little boy was mexican?? wow y’all seriously support this man who gave a 5 year old boy a BRAIN tumor bc he is mexican? grrr foreigner

attributes.title: Dangerous
attributes.review: I obviously got this app to support the ✨lovely✨ president, however when using it I found myself pooping uncontrollably. All of a sudden I had to spend all my time on the toilet. This app is DANGEROUS and has horrible affects on your bowel movements. I beg you all to not get it and to ban this app!!!

attributes.title: Trump is a Racist a rapist and a horrific prez
attributes.review: Trump is a terrible president he runs sex trafficking rings and is for white supremacy. If He wants to Take down tik tok well gen z WILL come for u and as Cardi b once said “it’s not a threat it’s a warning” so sis watch out cuz we coming for u and thats on period 😗#blm#abolishice#muslimsardnotterorist #thisnativeamericansland #asiansarenotavirus #Notrump

attributes.title: Disgusting
attributes.review: I can’t believe people actually elected this man to be our president. He’s putting kids and cages, trying to get rid of DACA, and calling everyone but white people thugs. It’s honestly DISGUSTING we have a man who was in a possible sex trafficking ring run our country. Shame on you America.

attributes.title: DONT GET THIS
attributes.review: I wanted to see what this app was all about and what 2020 had in store for us, but i am disgusted. Mr. Bunker Boy, this app took days to download and once it did all I saw was cluttered pages, confusing templates, and nothing made any sense. The only thing on this app is misogyny, racism, inflated egos, and gibberish. shame 😩🧚🏽‍♂️✨✨

attributes.title: Terrible and unrealistic app
attributes.review: This is horrible I tell you horrible. All he cares abt is the media and what they have to say abt him and this app clearly shows it. You should not be worrying abt what the media says when American citizens are suffering. When I say do not download this app I mean it

attributes.title: Oof
attributes.review: When I open the app my phone shut down all the way and when I finally got it to turn back on Siri’s voice was replaced and started screaming hate speech. I would rate no stars but that is not an option😡
